icd3

Class LongCountDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • icd3.LongCountDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MayanDate<LongCountDate>

    public class LongCountDate
extends java.lang.Object
implements MayanDate<LongCountDate>
    An immutable data structure representing the Mayan Long Count absolute date.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  LongCountDate.Period
      The periods used in the Mesoamerican Long Count Calendar, and their lengths in days.

      Instantiates a LongCountDate object from its integer representation.

      Instantiates a LongCountDate object from its representation separated into place values starting with the single day unit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LongCountDate

        public LongCountDate(int value)
        Instantiates a LongCountDate object from its integer representation. Negatives are not permitted and will be interpreted as zero.
        Parameters:
        value - The integer representation.

      • LongCountDate

        public LongCountDate(java.lang.Integer... placeValues)
        Instantiates a LongCountDate object from its representation separated into place values starting with the single day unit. Negatives are not permitted and will be interpreted as zero.
        Parameters:
        placeValues - A list of place values from least significant to most significant.

    • Method Detail

      • calendarRoundToLongCount

        public static LongCountDate calendarRoundToLongCount(CalendarRoundDate calendarRound,
                                     LongCountDate start)
        Return the first Long Count date represented by a Calendar Round date after the specified date.
        Parameters:
        calendarRound - The Calendar Round expression of the desired date.
        start - The minimum Long Count date, inclusive.
        Returns:
        The first occurrence of the date at or following the start.

      • calendarRoundToLongCountList

        public static java.util.List<LongCountDate> calendarRoundToLongCountList(CalendarRoundDate calendarRound,
                                                         LongCountDate start,
                                                         LongCountDate end)
        Return all Long Count dates represented by a Calendar Round date within a range of dates
        Parameters:
        calendarRound - The Calendar Round expression of the desired dates.
        start - The minimum date, inclusive.
        end - The maximum date, exclusive.
        Returns:
        All occurrences of the date within the range.

      • minus

        public int minus(LongCountDate other)
        Description copied from interface: MayanDate
        Calculate the difference between this date and another date of the same type.
        Specified by:
        minus in interface MayanDate<LongCountDate>
        Parameters:
        other - The other date of the same type.
        Returns:
        The difference between the two dates. In an absolute date system (such as the Long Count), minus MAY return a negative. However, in a cyclic system (such as the Tzolkin), minus SHOULD return the positive equivalence class.

      • plus

        public LongCountDate plus(int days)
        Description copied from interface: MayanDate
        Calculate a certain number of days away from this date.
        Specified by:
        plus in interface MayanDate<LongCountDate>
        Parameters:
        days - The number of days to add (can be negative for subtract). If days is 0, this will return itself.
        Returns:
        A date object that is shifted from this date.
